name: Den Mothers
description:
Feed your kittens before your opponent.

Keyboard controls:
Player1 - WASD to move, hold LeftShift/LeftCtrl to grab
Player2 - Arrow to move, hold RightShift to grab

PS4 Controller:
Player 1 - Left Stick to move, hold X to grab
Player 2 - Left Stick to move, hold [] to grab

Art by:
Heleen Sikorski
Michael Shur

Programming by:
Robin Gersabeck
Lucas Wolford

Audio by:
Alejandro Hernandez


Source code available:
https://github.com/Code6226/minigamejam2015
